message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"also; in addition","sentence":"我有饭，还有水。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a dinner table with a bowl of rice, a glass of water beside it, and an atmosphere of calm but with faint hints of a transforming world outside the window. Subtle dreamy coloring, gentle lighting, and a surreal, peaceful ambiance even as the background hints at a quiet change.","sentence_translation":"I have rice, and also water."}
